fulfillment_node_id.description: The Jet-assigned unique ID of the fulfillment node that is being mapped to this returns location

carrier.description:
The carrier the merchant uses for returns

            #Logic
            * Only used when offer_free_returns = true

carrier_account_number.description:
The carrier account that Jet can charge if the merchant provide free returns to its customers

            #Logic
            * Only used when offer_free_returns = true

carrier_account_zip_code.description:
The zip code associated with the carrier account

            #Logic
            * Only used when offer_free_returns = true
